title: Calories in a Macaroon
meta_description: Learn calories in a macaroon with a full nutrition breakdown, including carbs, fat, protein, and tips for variations under 160 characters.
assumptions: Standard coconut macaroon, approximately 28g per cookie, baked with shredded coconut, egg whites, and sugar; no fillings or dips.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by recipe, brand, size, ingredients (e.g., coconut vs. almond), and baking method. Check labels when available.

quick_answer.text: A typical macaroon has about 140 kcal, mostly from carbs and fat.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts fields for easy comparison.

faqs.q: How many calories in a macaroon?
faqs.a: About 140 kcal for a standard coconut macaroon.

faqs.q: What are the carbs in a macaroon?
faqs.a: Approximately 18 g carbs, including 17 g sugars and 1 g fiber.

faqs.q: Is a macaroon high in fat?
faqs.a: Yes, about 7 g total fat per macaroon, with 6 g saturated.

faqs.q: How does macaroon size affect calories?
faqs.a: Larger macaroons (40g+) can have 200+ kcal; smaller ones under 100 kcal.
Traditional coconut macaroons often are, but check for added flours in recipes.
